txt.en: Defeated the first of the Draig-lûth. Onto the next!
A Draig-lûth warrior is drawn to your location
Talk to Eluna
Lure and defeat the second Draig-lûth warrior
Eluna and her students should have returned to Lhan Garan by now.\n\nTalk to Eluna.
Eluna has been located, but the path to Lhan Garan is likely being watched.
A Draig-lûth warrior is drawn to your location
Use the Dunlending horn to draw enemies away from Eluna and her scout-warriors.\n\nDefeat Dragon Clan warriors.
'Reinforcements to me!'
'I must warn the others. They're over here!'
'Curse you!'

'Good news. While you were out being a menace, Murig found his way over to me. Eluna is ok, but she's injured. We have to get her help soon, but the Draig-lûth are blocking the only path she can manage.

'Deryn went ahead to draw the bulk of them away, but we need you to split their forces even further.'

Marget pulls a horn from one of her bags and pushes it into your hands.

'Find a spot away from the road and blow this horn. It's of Draig-lûth make. It should create enough of an opportunity for us to limp back to Lhan Garan.'
Rescuing Eluna: One Last Diversion

'Hello there! What an eventful day we've all had. Do you regret agreeing to help me out?'\n\n'I owe you a lot, both for looking after my students and helping save me. Why don't we say I owe you a dinner? Once I heal up from my injuries and learn to cook, I'll make something fancy. Unless you like boiled things. I'm really good at boiling things.'
Marget would have you lure Dragon-clan warriors south to the base of the hills.\n\nMarget has asked you to use her horn to draw Dragon-clan warriors away from the river.
'The Draig-lûth warriors have been drawn away from Eluna's path. Return to Lhan Garan'
Lure and defeat a Draig-lûth warrior
Use the summoning horn at the first location and prepare to fight
'That sound came from over here!'
Use the summoning horn at the second location and prepare to fight
